Body.Content:
Introduction

July Copilot readiness insights are now available in the Microsoft 365 Admin Center on the Copilot Health page. These insights enhance data transparency and help administrators monitor and resolve last-mile blockers that may impact Copilot deployment.

When this will happen

General Availability: Available now

How this affects your organization

These insights provide visibility into Copilot readiness across your organization, helping identify and address configuration or deployment issues. They are accessible only to users with the following minimum required roles:

  • Global Administrator
  • Global Reader
  • Office Apps Administrator
  • Security Administrator
  • AI Administrator

There is no impact to end users, and the feature is available by default to eligible roles.

What you can do to prepare

Admins can visit the Copilot Health page in the Microsoft 365 Admin Center to view readiness insights. Ensure that appropriate role assignments are in place to access this feature.

Compliance considerations

No compliance considerations identified, review as appropriate for your organization.
